testcase.name: Verify guest user can access Your Lists intro screen

testcase.name: Verify that Items are added to cart correctly
testcase.system-out: Given user click on Todays deals............................................passed When user Clicks on secondnd category.......................................passed And Click on firstst product in this category...............................passed And Click on second item in this product....................................passed And Select Quantity two.....................................................passed And Click on add to cart....................................................passed Then go to cart.............................................................passed Then Verify correct items are added to the cart (name, price, qty and subtotal is correct).passed

testcase.name: Verify that user cannot log in with valid but not registered email
testcase.system-out: Given user click on Signup OR Login.........................................passed When user enter valid Email.................................................passed And user press on continue..................................................passed Then verify a message Looks like you're new to Amazon appears...............passed
